sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"保证"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ensure, insure, assure, guarantee, pledge, promise
means: ensure ： 侧重使人相信某个行为或力量产生的结果。
insure常与ensure换用，但前者多指经济方面的保证、保险。
assure ： 侧重指消除某人思想上的怀疑或担心，从而有达到目的的保证感，但不如ensure普通。
guarantee ： 指对事物的品质或人的行为及履行义务、义务等承担责任的保证。
pledge ： 正式用词，指通过郑重许诺、协议或立誓等保证承担某一义务或遵守某一原则。
promise ： 侧重表自己的主观意向，设法用语言使人感到稳当可靠。

sentence.Network_en: The drill should be slowly rotated to ensure a clean hole.
sentence.Network_cn: 钻头必须缓慢转动，以保证钻孔平整光滑。

sentence.Network_en: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is wind-proof.
sentence.Network_cn: 戈德史密斯修理了屋顶，以确保房屋能够抗风。

sentence.Network_en: An independent regulator will be appointed to ensure fair competition.
sentence.Network_cn: 将会指定一个独立的管理机构来保证公平竞争。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... religion n. 宗教；宗教信仰 ensure vt. 保证，担保 oppose vt. 反对，反抗；使相对，使对抗.
确字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 确 què 确保〖 ensure〗 确当〖 appropriate〗.
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... 坏的影响 adverse effect 担保 ensure 贴现 discount.
100句记7000单词带音标 - 豆丁网 ... inflation 通货膨胀 ensure 确定,保证,担保 repay 偿还,报答.

list.abs: this medicine will ensure you a good sleep ., 这药会确保你睡个好觉.
supervise production processes to ensure implementation of company standards ., 监督生产过程 , 以确保执行公司的标准.
"ensure"怎么说... ... Ensure vt 保证，担保，确保; Ensure quality 保证质量; 保证重点、统筹兼顾; ensure against 保护; 使安全.
ensure from 保护ensure to 保证给ensure 保证

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the senses 'convince' and 'make safe'): from Anglo-Norman French enseurer. alteration of Old French aseurer, earlier form of assurer (see assure). Compare with insure

encyclopedia.content: 及物动词 vt. 1.保证；担保[O9][+that][+v-ing] I can't ensurehis being on time. 我不能保证他的准时。 I can't ensurethat he will be there on time. 我不能担保他会及时到那儿。 This medicine will ensureyou a good night's sleep. 这药将保证你一晚睡眠良好。 2.使安全，保护[Q][(+from/against)]

entry.def: To ensure something, or to ensure that something happens, means to make certain that it happens.

example.ex: Britain's negotiators had ensured that the treaty which resulted was a significant change in direction...
example.tran: 英国谈判代表已经担保由此而签订的条约将是方向上的重大改变。

example.ex: Ensure that it is written into your contract.
example.tran: 确保把这一点写入合同中。

sentences.sentence: "This nest egg will ensure a nice retirement for us"

means.word_mean: 2. be careful or certain to do something; make certain of something;

sentences.sentence: "He verified that the valves were closed"

auth_sentence.content: Please ensure you have read the terms and conditions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please ensure you have read the terms and conditions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please ensure you have read the terms and conditions.

auth_sentence.content: How can we best ensure people understand this test?
auth_sentence.res_content: How can we best ensure people understand this test?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How can we best ensure people understand this test?

auth_sentence.content: This record should ensure such myopia is henceforth avoided.
auth_sentence.res_content: This record should ensure such myopia is henceforth avoided.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This record should ensure such myopia is henceforth avoided.

stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ed……的→adj.确实的, 确定的
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
assured[adj.确实的, 确定的]+ly表副词→adv.确实地;确信地
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
insure[v.保险,给…保险;保证]+ance表名词→n.保险,保险费,保险业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念
stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ance表名词→n.保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证人, 担保, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: sure肯定,确定+ty表名词→n.保证人, 担保, 保证
as一再+sure确定→一再确定→肯定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+sure[adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确]→v.保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到 v.确保, 确保, 保证
in使……+sure肯定,确定→v.保险,给…保险;保证
re再次+assure确信→v.消除某人疑虑

Sentence.sentence: It ensures that students' expectations are successfully fulfilled.
ensuring no child is left behind
The quota system in Sweden ensures women's better representation in government.

Both strains quickly invaded local hospitals when needle sharing and other unhealthy practices ensured the rapid spreading of the infection by bringing people into contact with contaminated body fluids.
The aim is to ensure that employees have an explicit tool to help them understand their own abilities and aspirations, determine career possibilities, and set (usually short-term) goals

sentences.en: I will ensure that the car arrives by six o'clock.
sentences.cn: 我保证汽车六点钟以前到。

sentences.en: We ensured it to be pure.

sentences.cn: 有准备, 成功就有保证。

sentences.en: This medicine will ensure you a good night's sleep.
sentences.cn: 这药能保证你睡一夜好觉。

jushi.english: A good irrigation system is very important to ensure a higher yield.
jushi.chinese: 良好的灌溉系统对保证高产是很重要的。

jushi.english: Several days' notice is advisable to ensure a flight on the day requested.
jushi.chinese: 要买到所需的某日机票,宜提前几天通知。
